entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ExceptBy doesn't include duplicates by comparer in first set that should not be excluded #64149
  • Remove `!` from `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Abstractions` #64147
  • Pipelines API: Reading incoming bytes #64145
  • The framework 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.App', version '6.0.0' (x64) was not found #64136
  • Detect when wrong tools are on PATH #64135
    7.0.0
  • System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.NJulianRuleTest crashing on Linux arm #64134
    7.0.0

Closed

  • ildasm has problems with non-ASCII characters #64045
  • CryptoStream.Read(Byte[], Int32, Int32) read the wrong data #64144
  • Principal ExtensionSet improper update for multi-valued properties with >2 values #34267
    7.0.0
  • Add Pure-attribute to Tuple types #64141
  • [macos][arm64][CoreCLR] DllImportGenerator.Unit.Tests failed: Segmentation fault #63439
    7.0.0
  • AF: g_TblIndex[ixTbl].m_Token == type in System.Reflection.Metadata.ApplyUpdate tests #64070
    7.0.0
  • ExecutionContext flow for library code #62589
  • .net6, GetManifestResourceNames return empty #64090
  • Type.GetMethod ignores BindingFlag.DeclaredOnly for records #64124

PullRequests

Created

  • ARM64: Avoid jump stubs where possible #64148
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix several bugs in NullabilityInfoContext. #64143
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Ensure that we aren't accidentally generating instructions for unsupported ISAs #64140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add test for exception throw inside Reverse PInvoke #64137
    community-contribution
  • Update tests to expect RemoteExecutor to check exit code #64133
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Optimize generic sharing for generic methods. #64129
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • align memory load calculation in GC with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Extra tests for assembly name parser. #64022
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix MultiByteToWideChar call in pal #64146
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Updating and fixing unit tests for DirectoryServices.AccountManagement #56670
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Disable NJulianRuleTest test crashing in CI #64142
  • Relax assert in ApplyEditAndContinue #64132
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fixing update issue with multivalued properties #34267 #56696
    area-System.DirectoryServices, blocked, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • pipelines: Add wasm jobs #64109
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add COMWrappers to crossgen #63969
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Add runtime support for `ref` fields #63985
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Options` #63767
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Dispose LdapConnections used by PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials #62036
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Abstractions` #64018
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to Set Next Instruction Pointer. #64114
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Commutative morph optimizations #64122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve `fgValueNumberBlockAssignment` #64110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Preserve existing keys in dictionary #63834
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add the exception set for `ObjGetType` #64106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Member resolving fix for derived attributes (#62937) #63837
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move libunwind directories to src/native/external #64043
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed #62866
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • add osr plus stress tests for libraries #64116
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix one source of perf regression in GCHeap::Alloc. #64091
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Bump Intellisensense package version to latest from `dotnet7-transport` #63352
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • Android remove backward timezones #64028

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dotnet tool] Add ability to check if a tool is installed #23549
  • [breaking] dotnet build/publish does not produce an exe/apphost for portable apps by default #23545

PullRequests

Updated

  • Better caching for RazorSourceGenerator when SuppressRazorSourceGener… #23419
    Area-AspNetCore, DO NOT MERGE, 6.0.3xx
  • [release/6.0.3xx] Backport Improve console output of `dotnet watch` ⌚ (#23318) #23400
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Watch, 6.0.3xx
  • `dotnet watch` test fix search console history #23521
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • False CS0023 error message #59023
  • Misspellings in CodeLens in 'ru' localization #59020
  • Warnversion Warning Waves.md is outdated #59013
  • Type confusion and OOB memory access in positional record structs #59010

Closed

  • Partial method filled in by source generator still getting red squigglies #58976

PullRequests

Created

  • Code Generation options refactoring follow-up #59022
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed CodeLens misspellings in 'ru' localization #59021
    Area-IDE, Community
  • List patterns: Recreate the decision dag for lowering #59019
    Area-Compilers
  • WRN_ConvertingNullableToNonNullable: fix literal #59016
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update Warnversion Warning Waves.md #59014
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove special string node type #59008
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Revert "Revert "Update System.Text.Json to 6.0.0 (#58365)"" #58888
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59011
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Handle AdditiveSpans in either order #58983
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59009
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Added additional test from duplicate VS feedback item. #57860
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59007
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59006
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Correctly update the list of generators for a call to WithAnalyzerReferences #58990
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.1

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59026
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #59025
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Json parsing with tests. #42873
    Area-IDE
  • Json parsing #42864
    Area-IDE
  • Compiler warning CS8600 message: say possibly null-valued expression #58860
    Area-Compilers
  • ✨ Implement SegmentedHashSet<T> #54574
    Area-Compilers
  • Annotate CSharpSyntaxTree.Create path parameter as nullable #59005
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle AdditiveSpans in either order #58955
    Area-IDE
  • Razor snippets #58857
    Area-IDE
  • Remove Duplicate Custom UI Visualizer Attributes from CLR Types #57828
    Area-Compilers
  • tweak diagnostic create warning level documentation wording #53718
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Community
  • Address param-nullchecking public API design review #58987
    Area-Compilers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1566533 #58926
    auto-merge
  • Introduce Parameter Should Not Try to Introduce on a Parameter #58959
    Area-IDE
  • Document why we have -vs-deps branches #41153
    Area-Infrastructure, Documentation
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support `u8` type suffix for UTF8 string literals. #58991
    Area-Compilers
  • [draft] IDE response to raw string literals #58846
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add RouteValuesAddress .ToString () #39708
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #39707
  • I want to set the permissions of an administrator and agent. I won't use it #39706
  • UseHttpLogging not working .NET 6 RC 1 #37577 and the answer You need to have information level logging for HttpLogging to show up, right now you're set at warning level #39701
  • Using CascadingValue causes to set out-dated value to child component #39699
  • Analyzer: Change expression-bodied property to action method #39698

Closed

  • SignalR C# Client StartAsync() CancellationToken not respected #39626
  • .NET 6.0.101 ASP.NET MVC globalization and localization is not working #39689
  • Is it possible to get full path of isolated JS/CSS assets for Blazor #39651
  • Introduce IFeatureCollection.GetRequiredFeature #25471
    7.0-preview1
  • Perf improvement: https #39660
  • Signalr MaxBuffersize settings causing large increase in memory on client #38558
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Spelling correction: Anuglar->Angular #39710
    area-mvc
  • Added more stream result types #39709
  • Refactor (WebJS) - Fix some ESLint warnings #39700
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • !fixup! Use non-`-Svc` pool #39695
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Add IFeatureCollection.GetRequiredFeature #39696
    7.0-preview1
  • Update branding to preview2 #39668
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Allow runtime compilation to be configured via the hosting startup. #39639
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.3

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When adding Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Base nuget package can't build the MAUI project #4276
  • MAUI App iOS publishing problem #4271
  • [Question] :How do I change Maui blazor's window's border color and its avatar/icons #4274
  • Compatibility: Ported Xamarin Forms Effect registration never invoked #4269

Closed

  • Debug Bug #4270

PullRequests

Updated

  • [ci] Target the Mac internal-macOS-11 hosted agent pool #4241
  • Update IOSWebViewManager.cs #4158
    area/blazor 🕸️, platform/iOS 🍎, s/needs info ❓
  • First pass at porting doc comments from Forms API docs #4099
    area/docs 📓
  • Support opening a new window in iOS Blazor WebView #4268
    area/blazor 🕸️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4130
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Check if navigation properties are loaded, without LazyLoadOnDisposedContextWarning #27255
  • Make sure EF7 does not currently depend on .NET 7 packages #27254
  • Remove parentheses by allowing providers to specify SQL operator precedence and associativity #27253
  • Problems with ToTable in IEntityTypeConfiguration #27252
  • Cannot use table 'AspNetRoles' for entity type 'AspNetRole' since it is being used for entity type 'IdentityRole' and potentially other entity types, but there is no linking relationship. #27251
  • Aps #27250

Closed

  • Issue with Scaffold-DbContext #27180
  • Add support for index ordering (ASC/DESC) #4150
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix typos in PropertyAccessMode #27248

Merged

  • Update branding to preview2 #27234
  • [main] Fix build break #27247
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for index sort order (descending) #27210

Updated

  • SQL parentheses work #27177
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw to 2.0.8-pre20220111224339 #27191
    auto-merge
  • [release/6.0] Update build and test machines #27238
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
